price: 134. Sinaamey Siinik Aba taamat dubuk Addunyâ galtó faxa Num, toysa Yallih xaqul Addunyâ galtoó kee Akeerâ galtó inkih tanik kaal esseritay, Yalli isi Naqoosah maxcooca yaabbi ken taamoomi yabali kinni.
arabic: مَّن كَانَ يُرِيدُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا فَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ ثَوَابُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: man kāna yurīdu thawāba al-dun'yā faʿinda al-lahi thawābu al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wakāna al-lahu samīʿan baṣīran
